name: openspecui-monorepo
description: OpenSpec Web UI - Visual interface for spec-driven development

scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:web & pnpm run dev:server
scripts.build: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter openspecui build
scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter @openspecui/core build && pnpm --filter @openspecui/ai-provider build && pnpm --filter @openspecui/server build && pnpm --filter @openspecui/web build
